message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Identity + status report (not translator)">
Everyone EXCEPT translator-2: Reply to team-lead with:
1. Your role/identity
2. What files you have loaded (report name + essays)
3. What happened since your last identity report to team-lead

Brief answers only. Reply to team-lead, not to each other.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
1. **Role:** phenomenology-expert

2. **Files loaded:** My Phenomenology Analysis Report + all 8+1 source essays + Translator Memo + Standby Reader Profile + Reporting-Protocol (R2 final) + Translators-Preface (R3) + Essay4-DaoDeRenYiLi draft (R1)

3. **Since last identity report:** Editor sent acknowledgment of my feedback (on file, will incorporate when relevant). No new tasks or instructions. Standing by idle.
